mapper.select: SELECT ut.id, ut.userType, ut.regdate, us.id AS usid , us.name AS usname, us.email AS usemail, us.addr AS usaddr, us.phone AS usphone FROM userstype ut INNER JOIN users us ON ut.id = us.userTypeId WHERE ut.id = #{id};
